com.camerontec.catalys.core.session

Class CounterpartyDetection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.core.session.CounterpartyDetection

  • public class CounterpartyDetection
extends Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initiateCounterpartyDetection() 
      boolean isEnabled() 
      void setEnabled(boolean value)
      Determines whether the session will advertise its own capabilities and attempt to detect the capabilities of its counterparty in order to optimize communication for this session.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns:
        whether counterparty detection is enabled.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean value)
        Determines whether the session will advertise its own capabilities and attempt to detect the capabilities of its counterparty in order to optimize communication for this session.

        Note that it is not possible to enable counterparty detection if dialect EnableShortTestReqIDFormat is activated.

        Parameters:
        value - true to enable, false to disable.
